title: The Road Trip
description: When Dr. Teresa Sievers is found murdered in her kitchen, detectives struggle to find any leads until an unexpected tip changes everything. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 3, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
